You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesL L] > &leftrightarrow;

== Value ==

There are 3 variations of this entity:

  * `&LeftRightArrow;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2194/index.htm U+02194].
  * `&Leftrightarrow;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/21d4/index.htm U+021D4].
  * `&leftrightarrow;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2194/index.htm U+02194].
